.. _developers-guide-index:

############
Contributing
############

Thank you for your interest in helping to improve Teacher! There are various
ways to contribute to Teacher. All of them are super valuable but don't necessarily
require writing code at all. For example:

- contributing to the documentation
- opening new issues for bugs
- requesting new features
- asking for clarification on things you find unclear
- fixing bugs

.. rst-class:: sd-d-inline-block

    .. button-ref:: submitting-a-bug-report
        :class: sd-fs-6
        :color: primary
